original_title: SLT-MOBITEL offers unparalleled benefits with eSim services
original_body_lines: SLT-MOBITEL is offering an easy and seamless way to join the network with its cutting-edge eSIM service. Powered by SLT-MOBITEL’s unparalleled 4G connectivity and extensive island-wide coverage, this proposition empowers customers to get connected within minutes—wherever you are.

SLT-MOBITEL eSIM eliminates the need for a physical SIM card, enabling new customers to activate their preferred mobile connections digitally. This hassle-free solution not only offers convenience but also supports global digitalization and sustainability efforts. Whether at home or on the go, customers can enjoy unmatched data speeds backed by SLT-MOBITEL’s superior network coverage.

Customers connecting to SLT-MOBITEL eSIM services can enjoy the flexibility of having multiple eSIM profiles, each designed to cater to different connectivity needs. Whether for work, home, or roaming abroad, customers can easily tailor their connectivity to suit their lifestyle and preferences. Further, customers will also receive free 15GB Anytime Data and 100 Minutes to Any Network. This limited offer is available for anyone onboarding the network and have a perfect start to experience SLT-MOBITEL’s seamless network experience.

Customers can avail the eSIM service by simply visiting the website at www.mobitel.lk/esim, fill out the necessary information, upload the required documents, and sign off with the payment process via credit or debit card. To check if your device is compatible with SLT-MOBITEL eSIM, dial *#06# on your phone. If you receive an Embedded Identity Document (EID) number, your device is eSIM-ready. During this process of online onboarding, you can choose from a range of popular plans such as the SLT-Mobitel 555 Any Data Combo Plan, Social Chill Plans, or the Aviator Plans that offer extensive benefits and rewards based on one’s preference.

SLT-MOBITEL’s eSIM service is a key initiative under its Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) commitments, reducing dependency on traditional plastic SIM cards and making customers part of its drive toward building a greener future.
